typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(deptid,
		deptname),
	count = greater(count(deptid),1)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 alterRow(deleteIf(1!=1),
	insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		deptid,
		deptname,
		count
	)) ~> sink1
